      • joinGame

        public abstract int joinGame​(java.lang.String name,
                             PlayerColor color)
        Parameters:
        name - is the name chosen for the login
        color - is the color chosen for the player
        Returns:
        the id of the player if the login was successful, -1 otherwise

      • reconnect

        public abstract int reconnect​(java.lang.String name)
        this method will reconnect the player to the server if the client was shut down
        Parameters:
        name - is the name chosen
        Returns:
        the player id or -1 if something went wrong

      • spawn

        public abstract void spawn​(CachedPowerUp powerUp)
        Forward the PowerUp chosen by the player to discard to spawn
        Parameters:
        powerUp - powerUp chosen by the user to spawn in the same color spawn cell

      • doAction

        public abstract void doAction​(JsonAction jsonAction)
        will be used for both powerUp and Actions
        Parameters:
        jsonAction - is the action the client submits

      • askMoveValid

        public abstract boolean askMoveValid​(int row,
                                     int column,
                                     Directions direction)
        This helper method is used to let the client ask if a single direction is valid, so it doesn't have to know all map adjacences in local, but it just asks the server every time he needs
        Parameters:
        row - index of the matrix inside the Map
        column - index of the column inside the Map
        direction - Direction (N,S,E,O) where the player wants to move from his current position
        Returns:
        true if the direction is valid, false otherwise
